internationalizations.description:
University of Dhaka is a company focused in solutions for education, its main product is a set of solutions for studying for getting the driver license, among them, there are multimedia, online applications, mobile apps, books, and others.

At FÃ¡cil Tecnologias LTDA, I got in touch with senior developers, learning best practices, patterns, and how to debate ideas and offer various solutions for the very same problem. It was the start point, a unique opportunity to turn theoretical knowledge into concrete solutions that were being used by hundreds of people every day.
